docBody.p: Religion and tradition taught women to repress as disgusting and sinful all manifestations of the sexual impulse, with the result that in women more than in men the sexual impulse tends to be driven below the surface and to seek an outlet in remote and often unconscious paths, this being the great fact on which Freud seized.

We cannot regulate the sex life of man without considering that of woman, and it has become increasingly evident from recent investigations and studies that there is not and never has been a special sexual psychology of woman. It was an idea originating in monasteries and convents, and is now rapidly falling into discredit.

It is the modern viewpoint of such scientist as Briffault that mammals as a whole show less the sex impulse the sex urge takes two forms--sex impulse and mating impulse, the latter being that desire or tendency to prolonged association of the sexes, as in courtship, marriage, and parental care and affection. This latter impulse, however, does not exist in the great majority of animals, while the sex impulse is almost universal and is the basic force behind or underlying the motives of the mating instinct in the primates.
